modName: Imperial Beserker and craftable Imperial Warhammer
summary:
Note: This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC if you don\'t have it then you can\'t use this mod.
This mod adds an Imperial Warhammer to the game which is craftable under the Imperial category and is upgradeable. It also adds a new NPC to Solitude who has a warhammer.

I do not take credit for the warhammer itself, it is mad
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD IS BEING REDONE

Note: This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC if you don\'t have it then you can\'t use this mod.
This mod adds an Imperial Warhammer to the game which is craftable under the Imperial category and is upgradeable, there is also a new NPC added to solitude in the Training area, he has no dialog but he does have the warhammer so if you can avoid getting seen you can kill him and take it for yourself.
I hope you enjoy.

I do not take credit for the warhammer itself, it is made by Bethesda but I decided to make a disenchanted version of the original.

Updates: V.2 in development it will include full integration into Skyrim and that means you will find it on your travels.

Read posts for update news.

Opethfeldt6 ENB was used for the images find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18941/?

Credits: Bethesda for the Warhammer mesh and texture.
author: JDcrafter
